text:
[Verse]
Morning sun is shining bright
Chasing butterflies in flight
In the meadow green and wide
Where our secret dreams reside

[Verse 2]
Running through the fields we laugh
Skipping stones along the path
Whispering hopes in the breeze
Underneath the tall oak trees

[Chorus]
Chasing butterflies
In the open sky
With the world to explore
We can't ask for more

[Verse 3]
Tiny wings of fragile gold
Stories yet to be told
In the colors of the dawn
Catch a dream and then move on

[Verse 4]
Dancing shadows in the light
Promises of day and night
Magic moments passing by
Chasing dreams that never die

[Chorus]
Chasing butterflies
In the open sky
With the world to explore
We can't ask for more
title: Chasing Butterflies
